trans-unit.source: Using the Visual Basic Development Environment | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Basic 开发环境 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Using the Visual Basic Development Environment
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Basic 开发环境

trans-unit.source: In addition to the core user interface features that Visual Studio provides, the Visual Basic integrated development environment (IDE) adds some to help with productivity and ease of use.
trans-unit.target: 除了 Visual Studio 提供的核心用户界面功能，Visual Basic 的集成的开发环境 (IDE) 将添加一些有助于提供的效率和易用性。

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: 本节内容

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic Settings](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/settings.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic 设置](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/settings.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to optimize your experience working in the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 介绍如何优化在开发环境中工作的体验。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic IntelliSense Code Snippets](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/intellisense-code-snippets.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic IntelliSense 代码段](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/intellisense-code-snippets.md)

trans-unit.source: Introduces a library of code that you can access from within the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 引入了一个可以从开发环境中访问的代码的库。

trans-unit.source: [Help for Event Handlers in Visual Basic Code](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/help-for-event-handlers.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic 代码中事件处理程序的相关帮助](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/help-for-event-handlers.md)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to get F1 Help on an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 演示如何获取有关事件处理程序的 F1 帮助。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Compile and Run a Project](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/how-to-compile-and-run-a-project.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 编译和运行项目](../../../visual-basic/developing-apps/using-ide/how-to-compile-and-run-a-project.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes your options for compiling and running from within the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 介绍用于的编译和运行在开发环境中的选项。

trans-unit.source: Related Topics
trans-unit.target: 相关主题

trans-unit.source: [Refactoring](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/vb-ide/refactoring-vb)
trans-unit.target: [重构](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/vb-ide/refactoring-vb)

trans-unit.source: Describes the the process of improving your code after it has been written by changing the internal structure of the code without changing the external behavior of the code.
trans-unit.target: 描述提高您的代码之后已更改的代码的内部结构，但未更改的代码的外部行为写入它的过程。

trans-unit.source: [Code Generation](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/vb-ide/code-generation-vb) Describes how Visual Studio can help generate portions of source code for you.
trans-unit.target: [代码生成](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/vb-ide/code-generation-vb) 介绍 Visual Studio 可以帮助将为您生成代码的源代码的部分。

trans-unit.source: Reference
trans-unit.target: 参考

trans-unit.source: [Default Keyboard Shortcuts](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/default-keyboard-shortcuts-in-visual-studio)
trans-unit.target: [默认键盘快捷方式](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/default-keyboard-shortcuts-in-visual-studio)

trans-unit.source: Describes the default keyboard shortcut combinations that you can use to perform actions without using a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 介绍可用于不使用鼠标执行的操作的默认键盘快捷键组合。

trans-unit.source: [Edit and Continue (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/debugger/edit-and-continue-visual-basic)
trans-unit.target: [编辑并继续 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/debugger/edit-and-continue-visual-basic)

trans-unit.source: Discusses the debugging feature that enables you to make changes to your code while it is executing in Break mode.
trans-unit.target: 讨论的调试功能，您可以在中断模式下执行时对代码进行更改。

trans-unit.source: [Configuring Warnings in Visual Basic](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/configuring-warnings-in-visual-basic)
trans-unit.target: [在 Visual Basic 中配置警告](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/configuring-warnings-in-visual-basic)

trans-unit.source: Describes how you can turn warnings off or have warnings treated as error messages.
trans-unit.target: 介绍如何能够关闭警告或将警告视为错误消息。
